subject: Greetings,
body:
Greetings,
I am Mr. Mike Lami Milla. My father Mr. Jimmy Lemi Milla was the minister of Cooperatives and Rural Development, South Sudan. My father Mr. Jimmy Lami Milla and his bodyguard were shot dead in Juba on Wednesday February 9, 2011 and my mother died 8 years ago.
Please view this website for verification
https: // www. bbc.com/news/world-africa-12403620
Before he died, he revealed to me about the two boxes, one of the boxes containing 225kg Gold Bars and the other box containing $18.6 Million which he deposited with a security company in Ghana for safe keeping.
Please note that the deal requires a high level of maturity, honesty and secrecy.
I have agreed that 30% of the total amount will be for your effort and another 5% to cover all the expenses that may incur during the business transaction.
I will give you details and procedure when I receive your reply, i will be waiting for your response in a timely manner. Contact me with my private email: 
mikelemimilla23@gmail.com
Regards,
Mike.

subject: Re: Greetings,
body:
Hello Mike,

I'm sorry to hear about the loss of your father. The information you shared about the two boxes with Gold Bars and a large sum of money is quite intriguing. Can you provide more details about how this arrangement would work? I am interested in learning more about the procedure and how I can assist.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John

subject: More Details,
body:
Dear John,

Thank you so  much for your prompt response and your expression of
willingness for help me, but before we proceed I have to give you some
detailed information on the reason why you were contacted .we will want to
present your name to the security company as our family investor trustee
and we shall be having a meeting with the director of the security company
to know what is the next plan of action .

My father wrote an M.O.U with the security company were the consignment are
deposited and mandating them not to release the consignment to me , unless
we appoints a foreign INVESTOR / TRUSTEE from a develop country and a
political stable country who will handle the investment on our behalf.

We will require the following under-listed to be able to fully present your
details to the security company and the custodian of the consignment. After
the meeting I will get back to you with their advice on how you can take
possession of the consignment.

1. Your Full Name?
2. Your Full Address; including your direct Phone and Fax?
3. Your Nationality?
4. Your Occupation?
5. How Old Are You?
6. Are You Married?
7. Your photocopy of your passport.
8. Your personal Telephone number.

Waiting for your urgent response.
Regards,
Mike.

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Dear Mike,

Thank you for reaching out and providing me with this information. I appreciate your trust in considering me as your family investor trustee. I am interested in learning more about how I can assist you in this matter.

Before proceeding, could you please provide me with further details regarding the investment and the security company involved? Additionally, I would like to understand more about the responsibilities associated with being an investor trustee in this situation.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Dear John,
Thank you for your email which I have received. I am delighted to hear from
you and the detailed information about this transaction shall be sent to
you in my next email. I look forward to a good business relationship with
you soon.
Truly yours,
Mike

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Hello Mike,
Thank you for your response. I'm glad to hear that you have more information to share in your next email. I am looking forward to learning more about the business opportunity you mentioned. Please feel free to provide me with any additional details you think would be helpful.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Dear  John,
Many thanks for your email and patience. I am pleased to announce to you
that I have officially filed to the Security company where the funds and
the gold are deposited in my name notifying them that I will be moving the
funds and the gold to you. The security company has requested that I submit
your contact/personal information to them soon for processing.

Please, kindly send me your personal details such as;

1. Names
2. Marital Status
3. Country of Origin/residence
4. Occupation/Age
5. Telephone Number

Kindly be informed that I need the above mentioned details to be sent to
the security company urgently for processing.

Once I receive your details, it will be updated and the gold/funds will be
moved to your doorstep/account with immediate effect.
Thank you for your cooperation and support.

I keenly wait to hear from you soon.

Truly yours,
Mike

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Hello Mike,

Thank you for reaching out and providing me with this update. I appreciate your efforts in moving the funds and gold to my account. 

Could you please clarify which security company the funds and gold are currently deposited with? Additionally, what is the total amount of funds and gold that will be transferred to my account?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Hello John,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like an exciting opportunity. Could you tell me more about how the funds and gold ended up being deposited in your name? I'm curious to learn about the process involved in moving them to my account.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Hello Mike,

Thank you for reaching out and providing me with this update. I appreciate your efforts in moving the funds and gold to my account. I will gladly provide you with the requested information.

Could you please clarify which security company is involved in this process? Additionally, do you have an estimated timeline for when the transfer will be completed?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: More Details,
body:

Thank you for reaching out and providing me with this update. I appreciate your efforts in handling the transfer of funds and gold to me. I will gladly provide you with the requested information.

Could you please clarify which security company is involved in this transaction? Additionally, do you have an estimated timeline for when the funds and gold will be transferred to my account?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Hello John,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your trust in involving me in this process. Could you please provide more details about the security company where the funds and gold are deposited? I would like to know more about their reputation and how they operate.

Additionally, I'm curious to learn more about how the transfer of funds and gold will be carried out. Do you have a timeline in mind for when this will happen?

Looking forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Hello Mike,

Thank you for reaching out and providing me with this update. I appreciate your efforts in handling the transfer of funds and gold to me. 

I will gladly provide you with the requested information. Before I do so, could you please confirm the name of the security company where the funds and gold are currently deposited? Additionally, do you have a contact person at the security company that I should address when sending my details?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Hello Mike,

Thank you for reaching out and providing me with this update. I appreciate your efforts in handling the transfer of funds and gold to me. 

I will gladly provide you with the requested information. Before I do so, could you please clarify which security company is involved in this transaction? Additionally, what steps should I take to ensure a smooth and secure transfer process?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Dear John,
Thank you for the email. Please, note again that the gold and funds belong
to my late father, he deposited them with a private security company here
in my name as the beneficiary, for safekeeping purposes.
Please, before we proceed further and to furnish you with the detailed
information about the gold and funds, including the delivery itinerary,
kindly provide me with your personal information as requested in my
previous email.
I look forward to hearing from you soon to get started.
Thank you.
Truly yours,
Mike.

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Dear Mike,

Thank you for reaching out. I understand the importance of providing the necessary information to proceed with the details about the gold and funds. Before I share any personal details, could you please clarify how this process works and what my involvement would entail? I want to ensure that everything is transparent and legitimate before moving forward.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Hello Mike,

Thank you for reaching out. I understand the importance of providing the necessary information to proceed further. Could you please share more details about the gold and funds, such as their origin and value? This will help me better understand the situation before providing my personal information.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Hello Mike,
Thank you for reaching out. I understand the importance of providing the necessary information to proceed further. Could you please clarify what specific personal details you require from me in order to share the detailed information about the gold and funds? I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Hello Mike,
Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the information about the gold and funds belonging to your late father. Before we proceed, could you please provide me with more details about the delivery itinerary and how we can move forward with this? I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: More Details,
body:
Dear Mike,

Thank you for reaching out. I understand the importance of providing the necessary information to proceed further. Before I share any personal details, could you please provide more information about the gold and funds, such as their origin and how they came to be in your possession? This will help me better understand the situation before moving forward.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
John
